Sekai Machache bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nlekọta nke bi na Glasgow, Scotland, ma na-arụ ọrụ na mba ụwa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na foto ma na-achọ ịjụ echiche nke onwe.

A mụrụ Sekai Machache n'afọ 1989 na Harare, Zimbabwe N'afọ 2012, Machache gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Duncan nke Jordanstone College of Art & Design (Dundee, Scotland). N'afọ 2020, ọ natara Morton Award maka onye na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dabeere na ihe nlereanya, nke Royal Scottish Academy nyere. N'otu afọ ahụ, ọrụ ya gosipụtara na Scottish Black Lives Matter Mural Trail ma ọ ga-esonye n'afọ 2021-2023 Talbot Rice Gallery Residency Programme. Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye otu Yon Afro Collective n'afọ 2020, sonyeere Edinburgh Sculpture Workshop dị ka onye nlekọta.
